extensionName.description: Extension name shown in the browser toolbar, store listing, and extensions page

extensionDescription.message: Simple, clean cookie management. View, edit, export, and protect cookies.
extensionDescription.description: Extension description shown in the Chrome Web Store and extensions page

actionTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over the extension icon in the toolbar

brandTitle.description: Brand title displayed in the popup header

domainLoading.description: Placeholder text shown while the current domain is being determined

searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text in the cookie search input field

exportButton.description: Label for the export cookies button in the action bar

addButton.description: Label for the add cookie button in the action bar

clearButton.description: Label for the clear all cookies button in the action bar

deleteButton.description: Label for the delete cookie button in the editor modal footer

saveCookieButton.description: Label for the save button in the cookie editor modal

cancelButton.description: Label for the cancel button in the confirm dialog

confirmButton.description: Label for the confirm/OK button in the confirm dialog

emptyTitle.description: Title shown in the empty state when no cookies exist

emptySubtitle.message: This site has no cookies set
emptySubtitle.description: Subtitle shown in the empty state when no cookies exist for the current site

loadingCookies.description: Text shown while cookies are being loaded from the browser

chromePage.description: Domain label shown when the active tab is a chrome:// or chrome-extension:// page

chromePageNoCookies.description: Empty state message shown for Chrome internal pages that cannot have cookies

errorLoadingCookies.description: Empty state message shown when cookies fail to load

noSearchResults.description: Empty state message shown when the search filter matches no cookies

editCookieTitle.description: Modal title when editing an existing cookie

addCookieTitle.description: Modal title when creating a new cookie

nameLabel.description: Form field label for the cookie name input

valueLabel.description: Form field label for the cookie value input

domainLabel.description: Form field label for the cookie domain input

pathLabel.description: Form field label for the cookie path input

expirationLabel.description: Form field label for the cookie expiration date input

cookieNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text in the cookie name input field

cookieValuePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text in the cookie value textarea

domainPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text in the cookie domain input field showing expected format

sessionCookieHint.description: Hint text below the expiration field explaining that an empty value creates a session cookie

secureLabel.description: Checkbox label for the Secure cookie flag

httpOnlyLabel.description: Checkbox label for the HttpOnly cookie flag

sameSiteLax.description: SameSite dropdown option for Lax policy

sameSiteStrict.description: SameSite dropdown option for Strict policy

sameSiteNone.description: SameSite dropdown option for None policy

sameSiteLabel.description: Form field label for the SameSite cookie attribute dropdown

jwtModalTitle.description: Title of the JWT token decoder modal

jwtHeaderLabel.description: Section heading for the JWT header in the decoder modal

jwtPayloadLabel.description: Section heading for the JWT payload in the decoder modal

confirmDialogTitle.description: Default title for the confirmation dialog

builtBy.description: Footer text preceding the brand name

brandName.description: Brand name shown in the footer, links to zovo.one

readOnlyModeEnabled.description: Toast message shown when a write action is attempted while read-only mode is active

cookieNameRequired.description: Validation error shown when trying to save a cookie without a name

domainRequired.description: Validation error shown when trying to save a cookie without a domain

cookieCreated.description: Success toast shown after a new cookie is created

cookieSaved.description: Success toast shown after an existing cookie is saved

failedToSaveCookie.description: Error toast shown when saving a cookie fails

cookieDeleted.description: Success toast shown after a cookie is deleted

failedToDeleteCookie.description: Error toast shown when deleting a cookie fails

invalidJwtToken.description: Error toast shown when trying to decode a value that is not a valid JWT

copiedToClipboard.description: Success toast shown after text is copied to the clipboard

failedToCopy.description: Error toast shown when a clipboard copy operation fails

cookiesCopiedToClipboard.description: Success toast shown after exporting cookies, includes the number of cookies

failedToExportCookies.description: Error toast shown when the cookie export operation fails

clearAllCookiesTitle.description: Confirm dialog title when the user clicks the clear all button

clearAllCookiesMessage.message: This will remove all $COUNT$ cookies for this domain.
clearAllCookiesMessage.description: Confirm dialog body text explaining how many cookies will be removed

clearedCookies.description: Success toast shown after clearing all cookies for a domain

failedToClearCookies.description: Error toast shown when the clear all cookies operation fails

readOnlyEnabled.description: Toast shown when the user toggles read-only mode on

readOnlyDisabled.description: Toast shown when the user toggles read-only mode off

cookiesRefreshed.description: Toast shown after the cookie list is manually refreshed

debugBundleExported.description: Toast shown after the debug bundle JSON file is downloaded

notificationReadOnlyBlocked.message: Read-only mode is enabled. Disable it to clear cookies.
notificationReadOnlyBlocked.description: System notification shown when trying to clear cookies from the context menu while read-only mode is active

notificationCookiesCleared.description: Title of the system notification shown after cookies are cleared via the context menu

notificationRemovedCookies.description: Body of the system notification showing how many cookies were removed and from which domain

contextMenuClearCookies.description: Context menu item that clears all cookies for the current site

contextMenuOpenManager.description: Context menu item that opens the Cookie Manager popup
